sentences.english: She saw the light burning and ran the rest of the way to her house.
sentences.chinese: 她看到點亮的燈光，跑完了剩下的路到了家。

sentences.english: The mist-filled valley and flickering lights below looked strangely welcoming.
sentences.chinese: 薄霧籠罩的山谷和山下閃爍的燈光出奇地好看。

sentences.english: An air-raid alarm sounded in the depths of night.
sentences.chinese: 空襲警報響時，城市的燈光就熄滅了。

sentences.english: The power will be fed to phone-charging stations, or to lighting and electronic advertising.
sentences.chinese: 這些電將用於手機充電站，或燈光廣告等處。

sentences.english: The lights of the car dazzled me.
sentences.chinese: 汽車前燈的燈光使我目眩。

sentences.english: Building facades pulsate with millions of lights and glowing neon display.
sentences.chinese: 在千萬燈光和霓虹燈的照耀下。

sentences.english: The lights in the ladies' toilets are crystal extravaganzas.
sentences.chinese: 女洗手間裏的燈光閃着水晶的光芒。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is easily ignited by heat, open flames, electrical sparks, and static electricity.
sentences.chinese: 電系統爲點火，喇叭，燈光，發熱器和起動器提供電。

sentences.english: The lights of the houses gleamed dully on the hillside.
sentences.chinese: 那些房屋的燈光沉悶地閃現在山邊。

sentences.english: If it is in the bedroom, make sure you can make the lights softer and dimmer.
sentences.chinese: 如果是在臥室，確保燈光柔和以及可以忽明忽暗。

sentences.english: Jeremy's eyes widened as he looked down at the city lights.
sentences.chinese: 傑瑞米的眼睛睜得很大，眺望這個城市的燈光。

sentences.english: I love the fireside when all the lights are low.
sentences.chinese: 我愛燈光微弱時的圍爐。

sentences.english: Yeah, the lighting and sound effects are first-class.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，舞臺燈光和音響效果都是一流的。

sentences.english: I was very grateful for the orange glow of the fire through the canvas tent.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感激帆布帳篷裏透出的橘色燈光。

sentences.english: I wasn’t through three sentences before the lights came up again.
sentences.chinese: 我還未講完三句話，燈光又亮了起來。

sentences.english: Mr. Blare was invited to be in charge of lightening of stage.
sentences.chinese: 布萊爾先生被邀負責舞臺的燈光設計。

definition: scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
